hero.tagline: Building innovative solutions with modern technologies

about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm a passionate Software Engineering student at Stuttgart University with a strong foundation in AI/ML, full-stack development, and research. My journey spans from developing award-winning machine learning models to building production applications serving thousands of users. I'm always open to opportunities in research, internships, or collaboration. Let's build something amazing together!

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: Innovative solutions combining cutting-edge technologies with real-world impact

skills.title: Technical Expertise
skills.subtitle: Comprehensive skill set across the full development stack

volunteering.title: Volunteer Experience
volunteering.subtitle: Contributing to causes I care about through technology and service

cta.title: Passionate About Giving Back
cta.message: I believe in using technology to make a positive impact on society. If you have a volunteer opportunity or know of a cause that could benefit from my skills, I'd love to hear about it!

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? I'm available for internships, research opportunities, and collaborations. Let's create something extraordinary!

footer.message: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your visions.
